goal.ch:
This course aims to achieve the following objectives:
1.Students will be able to demonstrate abilities to use verbal and written English in technical context as well as business settings.
2.Students will be able to demonstrate an ability to conduct technical and business presentations in English.
3.Students will be able to understand and analyze technology and business trends in English news/reports/publications.
4.Students will be better prepared for a career where spoken English is required.
goal.en:
This course aims to achieve the following objectives:
1.Students will be able to demonstrate abilities to use verbal and written English in technical context as well as business settings.
2.Students will be able to demonstrate an ability to conduct technical and business presentations in English.
3.Students will be able to understand and analyze technology and business trends in English news/reports/publications.
4.Students will be better prepared for a career where spoken English is required.
